name: REGISTER_VERIFY
value:
Email Sent. Kindly verify your account to register.
The link will expire after 10 minutes.

name: REGISTER_EMAIL_ERROR
value: Email is invalid or already exists.

name: FORGOT_EMAIL_SENT
value: Email sent. Please also check the spam.

name: ALREADY_REGISTERED
value: Already registered! Please try a different one.

name: UPLOAD_ERROR
value: Sorry, there was an error uploading your file.

name: TOKEN_EXPIRED
value: Sorry, your token does not exists or already expired.

name: DATABASE_PROGRESS
value:
Database Missing... Importing Database Backup
DON'T RELOAD THIS PAGE. THE PAGE WILL RELOAD ITSELF.

name: DATABASE_LOGIN_ERROR
value:
Cannot Import Database Backup!
Invalid Root Password. Please make sure it is blank.

name: NOT_ENOUGH_GUESTS
value: Please enter a valid number of guests!

name: INVALID_CHECK_DATE
value: Check Out date must be greater than Check In date.

name: ALREADY_RESERVED
value: Sorry, The room was already reserved. Please reserve another room.

name: CHOOSE_ROOM_TO_PROCEED
value: Please choose a room before proceeding.

name: REVERT_TAKEN_ERROR
value: You cannot revert it because the room was already taken.

name: CHECK_TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS
value: Please check the terms and conditions to proceed.

name: MUST_ADD_PICTURE
value: You must add first a bank reference picture!

name: MAX_ROOM_ERROR
value: For booking more than {0} rooms, please contact the hotel.

name: NO_PERMISSION
value: You don't have a permission to access this page.

name: ROOM_NOT_AVAILABLE_IN_DATE
value: Room is not available in your chosen date!
